bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Cable Connections for Gas Insulated Substations
IEEE Draft Guide for Cable Connections for Gas Insulated Substations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide establishes typical dimensions for connections of a gas-insulated substation (GIS) to extruded, self contained fluid filled and high pressure fluid filled (pipe type) cables in single and three phase arrangements for voltages 72.5 kV to 550 kV.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
